projects.title: Dungeon Core
projects.description: Dungeon management game with a React frontend, detailed JSON-based monster evolution trees, trait system, unlock conditions, and a comprehensive GDD. Features persistent adventurer parties, mana/trap economy, room themes, monster breeds/evolution, and advanced UI/gameplay systems. All monster, trait, and unlock data is modular and up-to-date.
